title: Upgrading
intro: If you wish to upgrade to FieldLogs Enterprise the process is simple. Simply follow the instructions in this section.

points.text: Navigate to the Settings page by clicking the gear icon in the top bar (on the right hand side)
Fill in your details and submit the form - make sure you contact information is correct
The staff at FieldLogs will be in touch with you to set up your custom Enterprise structure if need be and get you started.

blocks.content: We are following this procedure while we are in Preview of our Enterprise features. In the future this step will be automated.
